t: What is LLM? - Large Language Models Explained - AWS
s: 3 days ago - Large language models, also known as LLMs, are very large deep learning models that are pre-trained on vast amounts of data. The underlying transformer is a set of neural networks that consist of an encoder and a decoder with self-attention capabilities.
